description: Welcome to the Mercury family: the Mercury Tour II High GTX® Men will accompany you in technical terrain, bringing improved support and greater grip with a redesigned vibram® sole. For an optimum sure-footed step on day outings or multi-day hikes carrying a heavy load. On the outside, the shoe impresses with the sustainable terracare® leather, tanned in an environmentally friendly process, which gives it an enhanced fit and treats your foot to pampering comfort on every path. High-quality Gore Tex material gives the shoe waterproof properties. Making the Mercury Tour II High GTX® Men an ideal companion in the mountains.
name: Mammut Mercury Tour II High GTX - Mens

specs.value: Individual 2-zone lacing. Can be adjusted to person and situation
Zones featuring Liquid Rubber reinforcements protect against abrasion and damage.
